mechanics.outcome: Wizard designates one 1st-level wizard spell from spellbook as Mastered Spell 1; Wizard designates one 2nd-level wizard spell from spellbook as Mastered Spell 2

mechanics.condition: Spell is a Mastered Spell AND Spell is prepared AND Spell is cast at its lowest level
mechanics.outcome: Spell slot is NOT expended for this casting

mechanics.condition: Spell is a Mastered Spell AND Spell is cast at a higher level than its lowest level
mechanics.outcome: Spell slot MUST be expended normally for this casting
Wizard can replace Mastered Spell 1 with a different 1st-level wizard spell from spellbook; Wizard can replace Mastered Spell 2 with a different 2nd-level wizard spell from spellbook

description_text: At 18th level, you have achieved such mastery over certain spells that you can cast them at will. Choose a 1st-level wizard spell and a 2nd-level wizard spell that are in your spellbook. You can cast those spells at their lowest level without expending a spell slot when you have them prepared. If you want to cast either spell at a higher level, you must expend a spell slot as normal. By spending 8 hours in study, you can exchange one or both of the spells you chose for different spells of the same levels.
